files.patch:
@@ -142,4 +142,3 @@ - *
  • An object is strongly reachable if it can be reached - * by some thread without traversing any {@link Reference} objects. A - * newly-created object is strongly reachable by the thread that - * created it. + *
  • An object is strongly reachable if it has the potential to be + * obtained and used by some thread without traversing the referent of a + * Reference object.
